LanguageData.TileSandstone.label: hiekkakivilaatta
LanguageData.TileSandstone.description: Jykeviä kivilaattoja linnatunnelman luomiseen. Pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.TileGranite.label: graniittilaatta
LanguageData.TileGranite.description: Jykeviä kivilaattoja linnatunnelman luomiseen. Pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.TileLimestone.label: kalkkikivilaatta
LanguageData.TileLimestone.description: Jykeviä kivilaattoja linnatunnelman luomiseen. Pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.TileSlate.label: liuskekivilaatta
LanguageData.TileSlate.description: Jykeviä kivilaattoja linnatunnelman luomiseen. Pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.TileMarble.label: marmorilaatta
LanguageData.TileMarble.description: Jykeviä kivilaattoja linnatunnelman luomiseen. Pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.FlagstoneSandstone.label: sandstone flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneSandstone.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. Not super pretty, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.FlagstoneGranite.label: granite flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneGranite.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. Not super pretty, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.

LanguageData.FlagstoneSlate.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. Not super pretty, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
